thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian Thanking Fans for Support as Scott Disick Steps Out With New GF
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian Thanking Fans for Support as Scott Disick Steps Out With New GF

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kourtney Kardashian Thanking Fans for Support as Scott Disick Steps Out With New GF
text:
Comments 'Reading your tweets and I need you guys to know how truly touched I am by your love. I love you guys. You help me more than you know, ' read Kourtney's tweet. 
Kourtney Kardashian took to Twitter over the weekend to thank fans for their support following her separation from longtime partner Scott Disick . The tweet was posted in the wake of photos emerged showing off Scott going out with new girlfriend , 18-year-old model and artist Lindsay Vrckovnik, in New York and Miami. "Reading your tweets and I need you guys to know how truly touched I am by your love. I love you guys. You help me more than you know," read Kourtney's tweet. The tweet was shared after the conclusion of Sunday's episode of " Keeping Up with the Kardashians ", which featured a promo for next week's drama. The promo gave a glimpse on Kourtney breaking down over Scott cozying up to other women over the summer. Reading your tweets and I need you guys to know how truly touched I am by your love. I love you guys. You help me more than you know. — Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) October 5, 2015 In the meantime, a source close to Kourtney has revealed to ET that the 36-year-old reality star has moved on from Scott and isn't bothered at all by his new girlfriend. "Kourtney surprisingly isn't fazed by this at all," the source said. "She's moving on. She knows it's just a fling." The source then added, "She's trying hard to ignore it and just focus on the kids. She knows they'll never get back together."
